footer.consent: By subscribing, you agree to receive EthCR emails
footer.workingWithLove: Working with love for the community

homeContent.communityDescription: This community is an open space to all people to learn about Web3, Ethereum and blockchain technologies. Enthusiasts, builders, artists, social activists. A technology for human coordination.
homeContent.youCanConnect: You can connect with other people in our on-site events, workshops, and meetups.
homeContent.youCanHelpDescription: Gift to receive is one of our values, if it is for you as well; you can help the Ethereum community
homeContent.inThisSpace: In this space you will be able to learn, share and
homeContent.newDevelopments: and new developments that the community has for you.

ethPuraVida.eventDescription: A web3 conference and hackathon in the <blue>heart of Costa Rica</blue>, to promote Ethereum adoption and educate the community, <blue>driving</blue> <orange>innovation</orange> <blue>and</blue> <orange>growth.</orange>
ethPuraVida.activitiesDescription: Our agenda is packed with various activities where you can learn about a wide range of topics before the conference; from workshops to hackathons, <orange>come and join us!</orange>

activities.title: ETH Pura Vida Hackathon
activities.description: Build innovative blockchain solutions in our week-long hackathon. Choose your theme and compete for prizes while learning from experts.

activities.title: ZK Proofs Workshop
activities.description: Deep dive into Zero-Knowledge proofs with hands-on exercises. Learn to build privacy-preserving applications.

activities.title: DeFi Innovation Panel
activities.description: Leading experts discuss the future of decentralized finance, emerging trends, and opportunities in Latin America.

activities.title: Smart Contract Security
activities.description: Learn best practices for secure smart contract development and auditing techniques from security experts.

activities.title: Community Mixer
activities.description: Connect with fellow developers, entrepreneurs, and blockchain enthusiasts in a relaxed networking environment.

activities.title: Main Conference Day
activities.description: Full day of keynote speeches, technical talks, and presentations covering the latest in Ethereum development.

ethPuraVida.callForSpeakers: We're excited to announce our <orange>Call for Speakers!</orange>. If you're passionate about sharing your expertise, we invite you to submit your session proposals for our upcoming event. Join us in inspiring and educating our community with your unique insights. <orange>Apply now!</orange>
